prayers.name: Apostles' Creed
prayers.text: I believe in God, the Father Almighty, Creator of heaven and earth...

prayers.name: Apostles' Credo
prayers.text: Credo in Deum Patrem omnipotentem, Creatorem caeli et terrae...

prayers.name: Our Father
prayers.text: Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name...

prayers.name: Pater Noster
prayers.text: Pater noster, qui es in caelis, sanctificetur nomen tuum...

prayers.name: Hail Mary
prayers.text:
Hail, Mary, full of grace,
the Lord is with thee.
Blessed art thou amongst women
and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.
Holy Mary, Mother of God,
pray for us sinners,
now and at the hour of our death.
Amen.

prayers.name: Ave Maria
prayers.text: Ave Maria, gratia plena, Dominus tecum...

prayers.name: Glory Be
prayers.text: Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit...

prayers.name: Gloria
prayers.text: Gloria Patri, et Filio, et Spiritui Sancto...

prayers.name: Fatima Prayer
prayers.text: O my Jesus, forgive us our sins, save us from the fires of hell...

prayers.name: Fatima
prayers.text: Domine Iesu, dimitte nobis debita nostra, libera nos ab igne inferni...

prayers.name: Hail Holy Queen
prayers.text: Hail, Holy Queen, Mother of Mercy, our life, our sweetness, and our hope...

prayers.name: Salve Regina
prayers.text: Salve, Regina, mater misericordi√¶, vita, dulcedo, et spes nostra...

prayers.name: St. Michael Prayer
prayers.text: St. Michael the Archangel, defend us in battle...

prayers.name: Sancte Michael
prayers.text: Sancte Michael Archangele, defende nos in proelio...
